description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Seasoned Chops with Salsa & Chargrilled Tortilla Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mexican Seasoned Chops with Salsa & Chargrilled Tortilla Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Put tortilla chips onto tray and spray with olive oil. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until light golden and crisp.
Combine seasonings in a small bowl.

Put chops onto a flat surface and sprinkle seasoning mix on both sides. Heat 1 teaspoon of oil in a large non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Add 4 chops and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking.
Transfer to an oven tray and place in oven.
Combine tomatoes, avocado, onion, lemon rind and juice in a bowl.
Serve chops topped with salsa and tortilla chips on the side.
